title: When someone you don't like makes a great play

replies.body:
{{champion:64}} Eh... good job, Satan...

{{champion:17}} Teemo...

{{champion:64}} That's what I just said.
{{champion:17}} Some days I wonder why I stopped at blinding him...

Played a game with a Yasuo, I was Janna, and he was flaming hard at me for not using my ult to save him once even though, as a Janna player, I knew it would not have saved him. For 10 minutes he flamed me non-stop for that, I was getting super annoyed and was done trying to tell him how i know my champ better than he does.  

Then me and him got caught out, he wind walled their engage, I flashed behind them and ulted he ulted off of that getting 4 of them, I Q'd them, he Q'd them, I shielded him and Exhausted their Vayne. He got a Quadra and the Zac got away after we popped his passive during the fight but couldnt focus him.  

After that he said "Gj with that ult Q and thanks for the shield man" and i said "kick ass timing on that windwall and great follow up". We honored each other. End of story.
I am a simple man, when I see papyrus, I https://media.giphy.com/media/AZJVxNK0LBgkw/giphy.gif
Good one man! I am sure this has happened to all of us lolol!
Whenever Fiora gets a kill. Or three.
Inb4 Fiora gets a double kill on her own teammates.

Inceptakill!  

She kills them while they are dead
Mad max didnt win best picture, TOO SOON LF
Seems sarcastic and not really sincere. My gesture would be sincere but with regret.
